articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.title: 7-Eleven is closing more than 400 locations in North America - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: Several hundred "underperforming" 7-Eleven locations across North America are closing, the convenience store announced.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Several hundred "underperforming" 7-Eleven locations across North America are closing, the convenience store announced.
Seven & I Holdings, the chain's Japan-based parent company, re… [+2477 chars]
